alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geneva and south central Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, western Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, eastern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1230 PM CDT... At 1140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hartford to near Bonifay to near Vernon. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Chipley, Graceville, Marianna, Dothan, Taylor, Bradford, Rehobeth, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Wausau, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton, Noma, Memphis, Southern Junction, Camps Head and Merritts Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
